Name: Little Shell's Adventure
About the game: GAMEPLAY Little Shell's Adventure is an action-adventure game with a cute, retro art style, similar to Legend of Zelda, Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion, and Minit. Little Shell's Adventure is centered around exploration, many paths branch off into secret areas. Extra hearts, money, and fun challenges are only some of the rewards that can be attained from leaving the path. STORY Little Shell's Adventure is about a turtle named Little Shell who, while at the beach, discovers a crab invasion. In an attempt to save his island, Little Shell sets off to stop the crabs and reclaim his home. DUNGEONS AND COMBAT Little Shell's Adventure is a combat-heavy game. Along the path, players can expect to find dungeons, wave rooms, enemies, and boss battles. Aside from being lucrative, fighting enemies in Little Shell's Adventure is fun. The combat is rewarding and challenging. Fighting bosses can lead to unlocking new abilities and lead to upgrades.
